p:
About 5 mg of dried solid SCU@CD-MOF crystals were accurately weighted ( n = 3) and completely dissolved in 25 mL of solvent composed of ethanol and water (2:3, v/ v). The SCU payload was measured using the above HPLC method, and calculated by Eq. (1):
